review:
Doc Jayashree is compassionate, friendly and above all is accessible at all times in times of need.
Listens to patients problems very intently and her talk and approach is very warm during stressful times.
She puts people at ease with her approach and is available for a call whenever requested and responds to requests thorough messages/ whatsapp amidst her hectic schedule.**** ********* ** **** *** above all, her motivating talk and suggestions to patients as to how to overcome stress/ disturbances especially during these pandemic times is something worth mentioning.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ****** ** ** ***** ************** The way she examined us and the she listened to our problems was quite impressive. Did not write down any unnecessary tests and all! Overall I am very happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very good and professional. She was happy to spend time to relax me and get to know me before discussing the medical issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Satisfied after consulting in first time visit . Got supportively guidance . Seems problem is resolve now getting recovered quick
